Starscream

Starscream nods at Phobia.

"Alright Captain. And bludgeon can give air support too." Starscream 
went to Jet Mode and took off as fast as he could so he could catch 
up to Reptillica. He did.

"When we get to your base I must have a meeting with Zardus. There is 
much about Megatron and Phobia I need to tell him."
______________________________________________________________________
Fliq

Fliq felt the images rush throughb his spark. Battles. Death. 
Watching people die. Ramulus' had had a tough life. But Fliq's images 
were seeping to Ramulus. Being asigned to Brix Prime when he was 15 
Earth years old. Saying goodbye to his family. Getting into a battle 
at the planet Scourgi, and alomst having their ship destroyed. 
Becoming friedns with Gekkidama, who would intern but him in this 
situation. Fnaly, the ship receiving the order to join the Neo Beast 
Wars. Crashing into the moon. Watching all of his friends die. 
Leaving Gekkidama. Coming to Earth. Getting the Octopus body. Being 
inside Bronco. Bringing out Brix with Ramulus. Telling Striker and 
Spears that they'll go to the moon. All the rest of the images came 
out, including his lat one, the pain of having his arm blown off by 
one of his closes friends. But than, Fliq thought he felt relief. 
SOmething was happening. He was beign repaired. But at the same 
time....Fliq thought he was changing.
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois

Vulois saw Child go down.

"No!" He ran over and picked him up. He decided to get Child back to 
the base and worry about the book later.
______________________________________________________________________
The Trainers/Savage

"Sir, there he is!" yelled Blaze.

Savage tilted his head up. Intruders. They would pay.

"Everyone! Beast Mode Tamron!"

The bots started to change and merge. Their robot had a Beast Mode 
too. When it ws done, it had the head of a Bengal. The torse of a 
Grizzly Bear and Buffalo connected together. The 6 insect legs of a 
tick, and the ginat wings of the bald Eagle. Tamron was ready to do 
battle with Savage.
